text: Salt-n-Pepa are an American hip hop trio. They started in New York City in 1985. Among their hit singles are None of Your Business, Whatta Man, Push It and You Showed Me. The group have gone through several lineup changes since their starting. They released their first album Hot, Cool & Vicious in 1986. "None of Your Business" won the Grammy Award for Best Rap Performance by a Duo or Group in 1995. title: Salt-n-Pepa
